narrative.narrative: Tianjin Airlines is based out of the city its name comes from, Tianjin, at Binhai International Airport. A young airline that has only been flying since 2007, it has a fleet of 80 planes. Fifty Embraer 190's,twenty-three Embraer ERJ-145's and 7 A320's. It serves 80 destinations in mostly China but also has service to South Korea,Mongolia,Cambodia,and Russia.
